short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With our InstaDP, you can view and download stories from Instagram.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
InstaDp Stories lets you quickly and easily download any story from Instagram.

InstaDp helps you to save photos and videos from any Instagram account.

Once you install this extension, an icon will appear on the top-left corner of your browser. Click on that icon, and the story will download automatically.

If you have any issues with the extension, please email me at: instadp.info@gmail.com
